description: A new algorithm at LHCb improves real-time reconstruction of displaced vertices using a Neural Network, increasing track efficiency and detecting long-lived particles.

title: New electronics for the HADES MDC drift chambers
description: HADES at GSI upgrades drift chamber electronics with PASTTREC ASICs and FPGA-based TDCs to handle higher trigger rates while addressing space, noise, and power constraints.

title: Impact of the high-level trigger for detecting long-lived particles at LHCb
description: LHCb adapts trigger algorithms to detect long-lived particles by improving efficiency in handling hit combinations, enhancing LLP reconstruction.

title: LHCb potential to discover long-lived new physics particles with lifetimes above 100 ps
description: LHCb, using the Downstream algorithm, could excel at detecting long-lived particles, rivaling dedicated LLP experiments.

title: Low Gain Avalanche Detector Application for Beam Monitoring.
description: The S-DALINAC accelerator uses LGAD sensors to non-destructively monitor the beam's time structure during energy recovery mode.

title: LGAD technology for HADES, accelerator and medical applications.
description: LGAD technology is used for high-precision beam detectors in applications like HADES, S-DALINAC, and MedAustron, with plans for future upgrades at GSI and FAIR.

title: Pomeron/glueball and odderon/oddball trajectories
description: This study predicts glueball and oddball resonances along pomeron and odderon trajectories, using high-energy proton scattering data.
